title: Analyse Your Text
disc: Textutils gives you a way to analyze your text quickly and efficently.It let you to count word, count charecters or reading time required.It has both light and dark mode for better compartable.

title: Free To Use
disc: TextUtils is a free charecter counter tool that provided instant charecter count and word count statics for a given text. TextUtils reports the number of words and charecter. Thus it is suitable for writing text with word / charecter limit.

title: Browser Compatible
disc: This word counter software works in any web browser such as Chrome , Firefox ,Internet Explorer ,Safari,Opera etc.
